Simone Subal Gallery
Artists Exhibitions Fairs

Julien Bismuth

Julien Bismuth (born 1973 in Paris) lives and works in New York. Solo and two person exhibitions include University of Florida, Gainesville, Florida (2023); Simone Subal Gallery, New York, US (2023); Galerie Georges-Philippe & Nathalie Vallois, Paris, France (2006, 2009, 2013, 2016, 2022); Parisa Kind Galerie, Frankfurt, Germany (2006, 2007, 2009, 2012, 2018, 2021); The Box, Los Angeles, CA (2008, 2015, 2018, 2021); Museu do Arte Moderno, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil (2020); Nomas Foundation, Rome, Italy (2019); Emanuel Layr Galerie, Vienna, Austria (2011, 2015, 2019); Centre d'art La Criée, Rennes, France (2017); Simone Subal Gallery, New York City, NY (2011, 2014, 2017); Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum, New York, NY (2016); Lira Gallery, Rome, Italy (2016); LA Existenzial, LACE (Los Angeles Contemporary Exhibitions), Los Angeles, CA (2013); La Ferme Du Buisson, Marne-la-Vallée, France (2013); Les Abattoirs, Toulouse, France (2012, 2013); Invisible Exports, New York, NY (2010, 2013); the Gesellschaft für aktuelle Kunst Bremen, Germany (2011); Frac Alsace, Altkirch, France (2010); Bloomberg Space, London, England (2010) and Foxy Productions, New York, NY (2008).Selected group exhibitions include Centre Pompidou Metz, Metz, France (2023, forthcoming); Musée du Jeu de Paume, Paris, France (2022); UNESCO, Paris, France (2021); Carré d'Art, Nîmes, France (2020); Nomas Foundation, Rome (2020); Kunstraum am Schauplatz, Vienna (2019); FRAC, Marseilles, France (2018); Fondation Ricard, National Art Gallery of Sofia, Sofia, Bulgaria (2017); MAAT, Lisbon, Portugal (2017); FRAC Île-de-France, Chateau de Rentilly, Bussy-Saint-Martin, France (2017); Emily Harvey Foundation, New York, NY (2016); Centre d'Art Contemporain Parc St. Léger, Pougues-les-Eaux, France (2016); Belvedere Museum, Vienna, Austria (2016); Pavillion de L'Arsenal, Paris, France (2015); Centre d'Art Bastille, Grenoble, France (2015); Ecole des Beaux Arts, Geneva, Switzerland (2015); FRAC Franche-Comté, Besançon, France (2015); Institut d'Art Contemporain, Villeurbanne, France (2015); Theatre de l’usine, Geneva, Switzerland (2015); Manifesta 10, St. Peteresburg (2014); Institut d’Art Contemporain, Villeurbanne, France (2014); Gagosian, Losa Angeles, USA (2014); Centre d'Art Contemporain du Pays de Lorient,Pont-Scorff, France (2014); FRAC, Bretagne (2014); Palais de Tokyo, Paris, France (2014); Maison Populair, Montreuil, France (2014); Musée du Jeu de Paume, Paris, France (2013); Sammlung Lenikus, Vienna, Austria (2013); Kunsthalle Wien, Vienna, Austria (2012); MUSAC, Léon, Spain (2011); Articulture Biennial Arts Festival, DCCC, Delaware (2011); ICA Philadelphia, USA (2011); Fondation d'entreprise Ricard, Paris, France (2010); Artothek, Munich, Germany (2010); Schirn Kunsthalle, Frankfurt, Germany (2010); Austrian Cultural Forum, New York, NY (2010); La Ferme du Buisson, Noisiel, Marne-la-Vallée, France (2009); Musée des Beaux Artes, Lausanne, Switzerland (2008). Past performances have taken place at Oslo Biennial, Oslo, Norway (2019); Centre Georges Pompidou, Paris, France Montevideo, Marseille, France (2017, 2018); Villa Medici, Rome (2016); FRAC Le Plateau Ile de France (2016); FRAC Le Plateau Ile de France (2016); Palais de Tokyo, Paris, France (2014, 2015); Kunsthalle Wien, Vienna, Austria (2012); MUSAC, Léon, Spain (2011); Tate Modern London, UK (2009); among others. Bismuth also founded the publishing house Devonian Press with artist Jean-Pascal Flavien in 2005. ­
